/* queryId : manage.orgnotice.getOrgNoticeListCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOARD_MESSAGE BM WHERE BM.FolderId = #{folderID} AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(BM.ExpiredDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= #{localCurrentDate} ) AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(BM.ReservationDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < #{localCurrentDate}) AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y'
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.BodyText LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.BodyText LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.CreatorName LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
AND
BM.BodyText BM.CreatorName BM.Number BM.Subject
LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(BM.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

/* queryId : manage.orgnotice.getOrgNoticeList */
SELECT BM.MessageID AS "MessageID" , BM.Version AS "Version" , FolderID AS "FolderID" , Subject AS "Subject" , NVL(SUBSTR(BodyText, 1, dbms_lob.getlength(BodyText)), '') AS "BodyText" , (CASE IsTop WHEN 'N' THEN 'Z' ELSE (CASE WHEN #{localCurrentDate} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TopStartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TopEndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'A' ELSE 'Z' END) END) AS "ListTop" , BM.CreatorCode AS "CreatorCode" , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorName) AS "CreatorName" , TO_CHAR(BM.CreateDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "CreateDate" , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT historyID FROM BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY BMH , BOARD_MESSAGE BM WHERE BM.MessageID = BMH.MessageID AND BMH.HistoryType = 'Export' AND BMH.DomainID = #{domainID} ORDER BY historyid DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) AS "HistoryID" FROM BOARD_MESSAGE BM WHERE BM.FolderId = #{folderID} AND ( BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(BM.ExpiredDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= #{localCurrentDate} ) AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND ( BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(BM.ReservationDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < #{localCurrentDate}) AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y'
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.BodyText LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.BodyText LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or BM.CreatorName LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
AND
BM.BodyText BM.CreatorName BM.Number BM.Subject
LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(BM.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ListTop ASC,
Subject BodyText CreatorName RegistDate MessageID
ASC DESC ,
Seq DESC, Step ASC

/* queryId : manage.orgnotice.getNoticeHistoryListCount */ SELECT count(1) FROM SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN OD LEFT JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE BM ON BM.MessageID = #{messageID} LEFT JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY BMH ON BM.MessageID = BMH.MessageID AND BMH.HistoryType = 'Export' AND BMH.DomainID = OD.DomainID WHERE OD.DomainID > 0 AND BM.Registdate BETWEEN OD.ServiceStart AND OD.ServiceEnd

/* queryId : manage.orgnotice.getNoticeHistoryList */
SELECT OD.DomainID AS "DomainID" , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, OD.MultiDisplayName) AS "DomainName" , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(ReadDate) , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM BOARD_MESSAGE_READER BMR INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER SOU ON (SOU.UserCode = BMR.ReaderCode) INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP SOUB ON (SOU.UserCode = SOUB.UserCode) AND SOUB.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE BMR.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SOUB.CompanyCode= OD.DomainCode ) AS "ReadDate" , BMH.RegisterCode AS "RegisterCode" , ( SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = BMH.RegisterCode ) AS "RegisterName" , TO_CHAR(BMH.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "RegistDate" , BMH.Comment_ AS "Comment" FROM SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN OD LEFT JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE BM ON BM.MessageID = #{messageID} LEFT JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY BMH ON BM.MessageID = BMH.MessageID AND BMH.HistoryType = 'Export' AND BMH.DomainID = OD.DomainID WHERE OD.DomainID > 0 AND BM.Registdate BETWEEN OD.ServiceStart AND OD.ServiceEnd
DomainName ReadDate RegisterName RegistDate od.DomainID
ASC DESC ,
OD.DomainID

WITH recursive AS (SELECT SettingValue vals FROM sys_base_config WHERE settingkey = 'BoardMenu' AND domainid=#{domainID} ), recurs(pos, remain, val) AS ( SELECT 1 as pos, vals as remain, substring_index( vals, ';', 1 ) AS val FROM recursive UNION ALL SELECT pos + 1, SUBSTR( remain, LENGTH( val ) + 2 ), SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTR( remain, LENGTH( val ) + 2 ), ';', 1 ) FROM recurs WHERE LENGTH( remain ) > LENGTH( val ) ) SELECT val AS "optionValue", Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) AS "optionText" FROM recurs JOIN sys_object_menu ON IsUse = 'Y' AND DeleteDate IS NULL AND MenuID = val
